Sentencas: An exergoeconomic study of an ammonia-fed solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based combined system for transportation applications is presented in this paper.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The relations between capital costs and thermodynamic losses for the system components are investigated.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The exergoeconomic analysis includes the SOFC stack and system components, including the compressor, microturbine, pressure regulator, and heat exchangers.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: A parametric study is also conducted to investigate the system performance and costs of the components, depending on the operating temperature, exhaust temperature, and fuel utilization ratio.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: A parametric study is performed to show how the ratio of the thermodynamic loss rate to capital cost changes with operating parameters.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: For the devices and the overall system, some practical correlations are introduced to relate the capital cost and total exergy loss.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The ratio of exergy consumption to capital cost is found to be strongly dependent on the current density and stack temperature, but less affected by the fuel utilization ratio.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic Analysis of a Combined Ammonia Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System
